title: Endless patching loop
body: obviously lots of people besides me are stuck at the patcher that keeps restarting over and over. Riot doesnt seem to want to post anything relevant besides blaming our firewall/security setting or sending link for hextech repair tool that stops working halfway through. Is there anybody there at riot that can actually help?

replies.body: Literally just started having this issue 30 minutes ago... :|
Same here me and my friends, even if i disable my firewall, looping.
Try right clicking your launcher > properties > compatibility > choose run for windows 8 compatibility. Worked for me at least.

Simple fix that worked for me, run the app as administrator.  It allowed the patch that was "needed" to go through successfully and open right up.  if that works for you as well you can take it one step further and right click the icon, properties->Compatibility->and check the run as administrator box to just always run league as administrator.  Don't get me wrong it still does the thing where it needs to repatch, but it doesn't loop for me anymore.
so its not jsut me cause i cant get hextech to force a repair, do i gotta reinstal or?
